name: All Singing, All Dancing
director: Mark Ervin, Jim Reardon, David Silverman
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Steve O'Donnell
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Homer is disappointed when the western he rented turns out to be a musical, so the family reminds him of the musical moments in the show's history.
